title: ISKCON
subtitle: Where Devotion Meets Enlightenment
paragraph:
The movement was brought to the western world in 1965 by His Divine Grace A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada, known lovingly by the followers of the movement as ‚ÄòSrila Prabhupada‚Äô. He wrote over sixty volumes of authoritative translations, commentaries and summary studies of the philosophical and religious classics of India.

 Thus, today Srila Prabhupada is recognised as one of India‚Äôs greatest spiritual ambassadors of the¬†20th¬†Century.

youthCourse.title: Youth Course
youthCourse.desc: Engage with spirituality in a youthful, vibrant setting.

gitaClasses.title: Gita Classes
gitaClasses.desc: Deepen your understanding of the Bhagavad Gita through expert guidance.

sundayFeast.title: Sunday Feast
sundayFeast.desc: Experience bliss with kirtan, wisdom, and delicious prasadam every Sunday.

bannerOne.message: Through selfless devotion to Lord Krishna, one finds fulfillment beyond fleeting material pleasures, fostering a connection with the divine that promises enduring joy and peace in this life and the hereafter.
bannerOne.title: Krishna Consciousness
bannerOne.subtitle: the art of spiritual living

bannerTwo.mahamantra: HARE KRISHNA HARE KRISHNA KRISHNA KRISHNA HARE HARE ¬† HARE RAMA HARE RAMA RAMA RAMA HARE HARE ¬† HARE KRISHNA HARE KRISHNA KRISHNA KRISHNA HARE HARE ¬† HARE RAMA HARE RAMA RAMA RAMA HARE HARE
bannerTwo.title: Krishna Consciousness
bannerTwo.subtitle: The art of mindful devotion

about.title: About ISKCON Dhanbad
about.description: A spiritual sanctuary in the coal capital of India, ISKCON Dhanbad brings the essence of devotion through sacred teachings, prasadam, festivals, and loving service.
about.missionDescription: We are a branch of the International Society for Krishna Consciousness (ISKCON), founded by His Divine Grace A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada. ISKCON Dhanbad strives to spread Krishna consciousness by nurturing spiritual values and providing devotional experiences.
missionPoints: Daily Bhagavad Gita classes & morning programs
Festivals: Janmashtami, Rath Yatra, Gaura Purnima, etc.
about.quote: "Chant Hare Krishna and be happy. The goal of life is to return back to Godhead and serve Krishna eternally."

youthCourse.title: Youth Course
youthCourse.description: Specially designed for students & youth to cultivate values, discipline, and devotion.

gitaClasses.title: Gita Classes
gitaClasses.description: Systematic and simplified understanding of Bhagavad Gita with practical application.

sundayFest.title: Sunday Fest
sundayFest.description: Weekly festival with spiritual discourse, kirtan, prasadam, and joyful association.

donate.heading: Support a Spiritual Cause
donate.subheading: Choose from our various devotional services and extend your support to ISKCON Dhanbad‚Äôs divine mission.

templeConstruction.title: Temple Construction
templeConstruction.description: Help us expand the temple and build a spiritual sanctuary.

annaDaan.title: Anna Daan (Food for All)
annaDaan.description: Feed the needy and devotees with love and compassion.

nityaSeva.title: Nitya Seva (Daily Worship)
nityaSeva.description: Support daily deity worship and temple operations.

vaishnavaSeva.title: Vaishnav Seva
vaishnavaSeva.description: Serve dedicated devotees who carry out daily temple services.

gitaDaan.title: Gita Daan
gitaDaan.description: Distribute Bhagavad Gita and Vedic wisdom across the world.

tribalCare.title: Tribal Care Seva
tribalCare.description: Uplift tribal communities through seva, education, and food.

festivalSupport.title: Festival Donation
festivalSupport.description: Contribute towards grand spiritual festivals and yatras.

templeConstruction.title: üõï Temple Construction Seva
templeConstruction.intro: Participate in this divine mission by contributing to the construction of sacred spaces.
templeConstruction.para1: To build a temple for Lord Krishna is not merely constructing walls‚Äîit is establishing a spiritual lighthouse for countless souls. Each brick becomes a blessing, each donation a step toward eternity.
templeConstruction.para2: Srila Prabhupada said, ‚ÄúA temple is a transcendental embassy of the spiritual world.‚Äù
templeConstruction.para3: By contributing to temple construction, one helps manifest Lord Krishna‚Äôs divine abode on Earth. Temples become centers for kirtan, prasadam, deity worship, and spiritual education.
templeConstruction.slokaMeaning: ‚ÄúWhere the Lord is worshipped, that place becomes a tirtha (holy place).‚Äù
templeConstruction.para4: Your donation isn‚Äôt just wealth‚Äîit‚Äôs bhakti in action. Your support helps build the altar, temple domes, and cultural hall for generations to come.

annaDaan.title: üçö Anna Daan Seva
annaDaan.subtitle: Offer sanctified prasadam and nourish both body and soul by supporting this divine service.
annaDaan.description: Food distribution is one of the highest acts of compassion in Vedic culture. As said in scriptures, ‚ÄúAnnadƒÅnam Paramam DƒÅnam‚Äù ‚Äì "Of all charities, giving food is the supreme."
annaDaan.description2: When we offer sanctified prasadam, it carries spiritual potency. Lord Krishna accepts such offerings with love, and when it is distributed, it becomes a medium of mercy.
annaDaan.description3: At ISKCON, through programs like Mid-Day Meals and Food for Life, thousands are fed every day. Your donation becomes an offering to Krishna and a blessing to many.
annaDaan.shlokaMeaning: Food charity is supreme, yet knowledge-giving is greater still.

tribalCare.title: ü™∂ Tribal Care Seva
tribalCare.subtitle: Help support our beloved tribal communities with prasadam, spiritual care, and joyful seva.
tribalCare.description: Your kind donations help nourish hearts and souls. Every rupee goes toward prasadam distribution, welfare services, and enhancing the lives of tribal devotees. Experience the joy of giving!
tribalCare.footerNote: Every contribution is a step toward spiritual upliftment and social harmony.

vaishnavaSeva.title: üçö Vaishnava Seva
vaishnavaSeva.description: Contribute to feeding devotees, saints, and needy people through this auspicious service. Each donation provides nourishing prasadam and blessings.

rathYatra.title: Rath Yatra
rathYatra.description: Rath Yatra is the grand chariot festival of Lord Jagannath. Join us in the divine celebrations and contribute to its success.

janmashtami.title: Janmashtami
janmashtami.description: Celebrate the divine appearance day of Lord Krishna with joy, devotion, and your heartfelt support for temple events.

radhaAshtami.title: Radha Ashtami
radhaAshtami.description: Honor Srimati Radharani's divine qualities and help us conduct beautiful sevas during Radha Ashtami.

footer.mahamantra: Hare Krishna Hare Krishna Krishna Krishna Hare Hare Hare Rama Hare Rama Rama Rama Hare Hare

footer.quote: "Chant Hare Krishna and be happy" ‚Äî Srila Prabhupada
